TopicTitle: Idea of When Server Migration will be complete

Articles.Content:
just tried to get the latest and greatest build for the 1.2 pre release and the site said they are in maintenance mode while performing a server migration. Any Idea when this will be complete?

 

Also, how do i use the win64 patch? Ive just been redownloading the whole game

Just tried the store and it's working fine.
But - Win64 patch?  Since the Unity update it has been native 64-bit, that was, partly, the point of the year-long engine change.  If you're downloading from the store you have both 32- and 64-bit executables.

Edited September 18, 2016 by Pecan
